channel.title: Having some Server Problems ~UPDATED~
channel.description:
Hi guys
I recently downloaded the latest version of Moparscape (Thanks for a great client ;)!) and I'm having some problems joining other servers. I have downloaded the latest Java + Java development but I have found I cannot join ANY other private servers. The webclient also does not work for me in FF or IE, I just get a Red Cross in the corner. Lastly, sometimes when I go to Moparscape webpages I get the blues screen with terms and conditions etc, but everytime I type yes it simply returns to the same page again and again.
Sorry if this has been posted before but I have looked through the forums to no avail.
Cheers,
[i]Magekillz123[/i]
[u]A Summary of my Problems[/u]
[ul][li] I cannot join [b]any[/b] servers at all, I simply recieve an "error connecting to server, must be down"[/li] [li]The webclient will not load, it says in bottom error loading applet[/li] [li]The blue screen with T&C at the moparisthebest.com website continually reloads after I type "Yes" and click accept[/li] [li]If I ping any server it says "timedout" or "cannot connect to server". (They are definatley online)[/li][/ul]

item.title: Having some Server Problems ~UPDATED~
item.dc:creator: @magekillz123 magekillz123
item.description:
@magekillz123 wrote:

Thanks Delta

I tried using your ip and the same problem, sits for about 2 minutes than says “error connecting to server” etc.

I have also tried pinging various servers, and each time it says connection to server name timed out.

I have now uninstalled and reinstalled mopar scape as well, so now im really confused :S

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2008, 10:46:54 AM[/size][hr]Anyone? You would have thought that Moparscape staff would do everything to help their users…

Read full topic

item.title: Having some Server Problems ~UPDATED~
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Then that means that the client loads? Try using my ip

Read full topic

item.title: Having some Server Problems ~UPDATED~
item.dc:creator: @magekillz123 magekillz123
item.description:
@magekillz123 wrote:

marc is hood:

You might be joining servers with when you start you start with a skillcape or a silab item. Try getting silab, go to client.silabsoft.org for the webclient.

Ok Ill give that a go.

Oh sorry I missed out that I always get the “Error connecting to server, must be down” but theyre definatley up, just incase this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Having some Server Problems ~UPDATED~
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Try using the mozilla firefox browser, my old browser wouldn’t let me use webclients, then when I downloaded firefox, the webclient loaded

Read full topic

item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

You might be joining servers with when you start you start with a skillcape or a silab item. Try getting silab, go to client.silabsoft.org for the webclient.
